about_the_game:
Get ready to fight against pixelated foes with the Pixel Battlers Monsters Pack 1! ELV Games has created a pack stuffed with front view monsters in their bright pixel art style for your heroes to defeat!

36 unique monster designs offer up a wide selection of possible enemies for your heroes to challenge. Each monster comes with 4 color variations for a total of 144 enemies to choose from! Use brown, red, blue, and tan minotaurs to show their elemental weaknesses. Or have different colors show different power levels depending on which dungeon your heroes are exploring. If your retro pixel art-filled games need some monsters, check out the Pixel Battlers Monsters Pack 1!

Contents:

- RPG Monsters for your game!
- 36 Unique Monsters!
- 4 Variations of each monster!
- 144 Total Monsters!
- 64x64 Pixelart sprites!
- Scaled perfectly for RPG Maker!


Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
